DamageImmunities: Bludgeoning, Slashing, and Piercing from non-magical weapons

Traits.Name: Cluster Infestation
Traits.Content: Giant Booklice can move through the spaces of creatures larger than them without impediment.

Traits.Name: Mold Eater
Traits.Content: Giant Booklice gain temporary hit points equal to half the amount of damage dealt by their mandibles when they consume mold or fungus.

Actions.Name: Mandible Scrape
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, dealing 1 piercing damage plus 7 (3d4) acid damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Infest
Actions.Content: The Giant Booklice swarm over a creature within 5 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 4 (1d8) poison damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Dust Cloud
Actions.Content: The Giant Booklice create a cloud of mold spores in a 10-foot radius around themselves. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 3 (1d6) necrotic damage and be poisoned until the end of its next turn.
